phase.name: Any phase
phase.tooltip: This action can be used during any phase of combat.

data.effectNormal: You can encourage another member of the crew to give her a bonus to her action. This works like aid another (see page 133), granting a +2 bonus to the check required by a crew action if you succeed at a DC 10 check using the same skill. Alternatively, you can grant this same bonus by succeeding at a DC 15 Diplomacy check. You can’t encourage yourself.
data.effectCritical: You’re able to select just the right motivation for your crew, increasing the bonus you grant to your crew members’ actions to +4.
